body: I can’t stand the chapters with her younger sister they look like twins.. it’s so disturbing to just look at.

Futaba. Stop fucking your sister. Don't end impregnate them!
Settled with Kaede even if she still a Minor i prefer if you end up with her.
ohhhh fuck... i am lost wth is happening

@OneFilthyWeeb it was that way since the get go isn't it? think it was inevitable for this series to take this route, she had that unhealthy obsession with the older sister since the start was using the other two (sometimes by force) to deal with that.

Looking forward to the next chapter.
Also, 1 week? Damn.

I still didn't read from the beginning, only here and there. But the more chapters get released, the more I feel this is getting way too dramatic for its own good. First I was happy for a futaxfemale story line with action and stuff. But this is getting more needlessly dramatic, with rape and shit.
Futaba sad because big sis won't talk to her. Don't care; she raped 2 minors. Go to jail you cunt

*After Futaba actually did it with her big sis, they didn't talked for a week *Depressed* *Saw JK Kaede walks by *Have sex. I hope Futaba got some sense in the end and settle it down with Kaede. It's the best route possible anyway.
I can't wait for this to get translated.
